data.name: Chat_Rebel_Outro1
data.value: Engineer, I owe you an apology, we didn't realise that a Sol Cooperative representative was aboard the station when we attacked.

data.name: Chat_Rebel_Outro2
data.value: I speak on behalf of the Independent Terran Workers, we were employed by R.O.S. to build and operate the facility you just left.

data.name: Chat_Rebel_Outro3
data.value: The company discovered an artefact of unknown origin but instead of reporting it, concealed its existence and attacked our workers, killing many of us, all to maintain its deceit.

data.name: Chat_Rebel_Outro4
data.value: We rose up to fight back and now seek to recover this artefact to deny the corporation from exploiting it to further increase their power.

data.name: Chat_Rebel_Outro5
data.value: We insist you come aboard our ship, we need to show you the actions of the corporation personally.

data.name: Chat_VA_BaseStart
data.value: Explore the base. Find a way deeper into the facility.

data.name: Chat_VA_BlastDoorClosed
data.value: The security system has sealed the blast door! There must be another route.. accessing schematics.. get to the elevator!

data.name: Chat_VA_ControlTower
data.value: You have located the control tower. The security lockdown can be lifted from here.

data.name: Chat_VA_Detection
data.value: Detected local energy signature, it appears to be an additional ROS facility but I have no official record of its existence.

data.name: Chat_VA_ElevatorBroken
data.value: The elevator is not responding to controls.

data.name: Chat_VA_ElevatorLocked
data.value: The elevator is currently locked. Finding control room is recommended.

data.name: Chat_VA_Excavation1
data.value: The projector is displaying a scan of some kind of artefact, they must have excavated from this location and moved it elsewhere.

data.name: Chat_VA_Excavation2
data.value: Warning: Security drone AI has been activated!

data.name: Chat_VA_InfoAboutEscapeShip
data.value: [go to escape ship text]

data.name: Chat_VA_Investigation
data.value: Investigation recommended, additional information could be contained within that may shed light on the conflict.

data.name: Chat_VA_Landing
data.value: Moon landing complete, scanning...

data.name: Chat_VA_LandingGearsWarning
data.value: Warning, landing gears are currently locked.

data.name: Chat_VA_NoHydrogenBottle
data.value: It is recommended to take hydrogen bottle as well. Hydrogen is requiered for personal jetpack.

data.name: Chat_VA_NoOxygenBottle
data.value: It is recommended to take oxygen bottle as well. It can be crucial to survival in space.

data.name: Chat_VA_PitBottom
data.value: There is surely an explanation for why they built this, I think the answer lies in these tunnels.

data.name: Chat_VA_PitDrones
data.value: Automated defense drone. Their AI is currently offline.

data.name: Chat_VA_PitTop
data.value: The main shaft is now accessible, I wonder why it goes so deep?

data.name: Chat_VA_Start1
data.value: It is recommended to equip yourself with backup oxygen and hydrogen bottles.

data.name: Chat_VA_Start2
data.value: There are spare bottles in that cargo container in the floor.

data.name: Chat_VA_Welder
data.value: This welder tool is much more powerful than your currnet one.

data.name: GPS_ControlTower
data.value: Control Tower

data.name: GPS_ControlTowerPanel
data.value: Control Panel

data.name: GPS_Elevator
data.value: Elevator

data.name: GPS_EscapeShip
data.value: Escape Ship

data.name: GPS_Excavation
data.value: Excavation Site

data.name: GPS_ExitCoords
data.value: Nav. Comp. Coordinates

data.name: GPS_MineEntrance
data.value: Mine Entrance

data.name: GPS_MoonBase
data.value: Moon Base Lobby

data.name: Hint_HowToDragAndDrop
data.value: Or you can drag the items from the right inventory to yours.

data.name: Hint_HowToLeaveSeat
data.value: Use [ {0} ] key to exit the seat.

data.name: Hint_HowToLight
data.value: You can use [ {0} ] key to toggle your headlight.

data.name: Hint_HowToRetrieveAnItem
data.value: Double click an item to move it to your inventory.

data.name: Hint_HowToUseInventory
data.value: Look at the square access port and press [ {0} ] to open inventory.

data.name: Hint_HowToUseJetpack
data.value: You can enable/disable jetpack by pressing [ {0} ].

data.name: Hint_HowToggleLandingGears
data.value: Use [ {0} ] to unlock/lock landing gears.

data.name: LCDPanel_ExtractionSite1
data.value: We are finally ready to

data.name: LCDPanel_ExtractionSite2
data.value: begin the extraction.

data.name: LCDPanel_ExtractionSite3
data.value: It will be much easier

data.name: LCDPanel_ExtractionSite4
data.value: to study the artefact at

data.name: LCDPanel_ExtractionSite5
data.value: the main base.

data.name: Quest01_Bottles
data.value: Prepare to Leave the Escape Pod

data.name: Quest01_Bottles_Drag
data.value: Double click or drag all items from the inventory on the right to your personal inventory on the left.

data.name: Quest01_Bottles_Escape
data.value: Press [ {0} ], [ {1} ] or [ Escape ] to close the screen.

data.name: Quest01_Bottles_OpenInventory
data.value: Access the floor cargo ([ {0} ] or [ {1} ] key).

data.name: Quest01_Bottles_Seat
data.value: Exit passenger seat by pressing [ {0} ].

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase
data.value: Investigate the Nearby Structure

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase_Controls1
data.value: Use character movement keys to fly.

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase_Controls2
data.value: Use [ {0} ] to ascend and [ {1} ] to descend.

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase_Controls3
data.value: Use [ {0} ] and [ {1} ] keys to roll left or right.

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase_GoTo
data.value: Go to the highlighted coordinates

data.name: Quest02_EnterBase_Jetpack
data.value: Toggle your jetpack on/off by pressing [ {0} ].

data.name: Quest03_LocateTower
data.value: Gain Access to the Facility

data.name: Quest03_LocateTower_Base
data.value: Enter the base through the highlighted doors.

data.name: Quest03_LocateTower_Open
data.value: Use the Button Panel to release the security lockdown.

data.name: Quest03_LocateTower_Tower
data.value: Go to the control tower.

data.name: Quest04_Descent
data.value: Go Deeper into the Facility.

data.name: Quest04_Descent_Elevator
data.value: Enter the elevator.

data.name: Quest04_Descent_UseElevator
data.value: Use the Button Panel to activate the elevator.

data.name: Quest04_Descent_WaitForIt
data.value: Wait for the elevator reach its destination.

data.name: Quest05_ExcavationSite
data.value: Locate Excavation Site

data.name: Quest05_ExcavationSite_ActivateProjector
data.value: Use the Button Panel to activate the projector.

data.name: Quest05_ExcavationSite_Explore
data.value: Search for the excavation site in one of these tunnels.

data.name: Quest05_ExcavationSite_Light
data.value: Use [ {0} ] key to toggle your suit light on/off.

data.name: Quest05_ExcavationSite_Located
data.value: Location of site was found and has been marked with GPS

data.name: Quest06_Escape
data.value: Escape the Tunnels

data.name: Quest06_Escape_Drones
data.value: The security drones are activating.

data.name: Quest06_Escape_Fight
data.value: Fight or flee from the drones, get back to the main shaft.

data.name: Quest06_Escape_GPS
data.value: Exit coordinates are marked with GPS.

data.name: Quest07_Elevator
data.value: Escape Using the Elevator

data.name: Quest07_Elevator_BlastDoor
data.value: Use the Button Panel to activate the elevator.

data.name: Quest08_Maintenance
data.value: Enter the Maintenance Corridor

data.name: Quest08_Maintenance_Elevator
data.value: I've put the elevator into diagnostic mode, it will go to the maintenance access subfloor.

data.name: Quest08_Maintenance_Quest
data.value: Get through this tunnel, it leads to a backup ship hangar.

data.name: Quest09_EscapeShip
data.value: Escape Using the Ship

data.name: Quest09_EscapeShip_Enter
data.value: Enter the ships cockpit by pressing [ {0} ]

data.name: Quest09_EscapeShip_Gears
data.value: Unlock landing gears by pressing [ {0} ]

data.name: Quest09_EscapeShip_Power
data.value: Turn on power by pressing [ {0} ]

data.name: Quest10_End
data.value: Fly to the given coordinates.

data.name: Quest10_End_Movement
data.value: Press [ {0} ] to fly out of the hangar.

data.name: Quest10_End_Quest
data.value: Use the same controls for your jetpack to fly the ship.
